doc.title: Simulacrum
doc.plot: In a pre-apocalyptic, retro-futuristic soviet world, a woman named Dallas faces unsympathetic bureaucrats after her identity has been accidentally deleted. Invisible to the system, she sets out to find and revenge her rebellious clone, who may or may not have set her up for this. But in her journey to the underbelly of the society, Dallas realizes that she no longer wants to be a citizen with a steady job, a clean record and a biometric identity. She discovers and liberates her dormant freedom. But is it her freedom or her clone's?
